name: .PXF File Extension
summary: Learn about .PXF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Pendix retailers and service partners can use the Pendix Service App (Android) to install PXF files on appropriate eDrive devices. To install a PXF file, you must use the Pendix Service App to connect to an eDrive via Bluetooth. Then, you can install the file on that eDrive.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
